title: League installer not working
body: So i recently got a desktop and tried downloading league. I downloaded the installer, but once I try opening it, nothing happens, nothing loads, doesn't show any errors or anything, how do I fix this?

replies.body:
It's possible the installer may be interacting weirdly with your OS, especially if you're running Windows Vista or XP. Try running [this installer](https://riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net/ShellInstaller/NA/LeagueofLegends_NA_Installer_9_15_2014.exe) to see if it works.

Let me know what happened.

Do you have a firewall up if so go ahead and disable it temp and try again i noticed that the ports needed to update are generally blocked by network firewalls or personal. 

Let me know if this works if not we can try something else.
